title: Margot Robbie embraces fall fashion with autumnal shades in baggy dress and boots on visit to NYC
text:
Her new film, Birds Of Prey, is set to be released in February 2020.

And Margot Robbie was the epitome of the calm before the storm as she stepped out of her Tribeca, New York City, hotel in a fall inspired outfit.

The 29-year-old appeared to be embracing the seasons change in a long-line dress and boots ensemble.

Fall ready! Margot Robbie was the epitome of fall on Monday when she was spotted leaving her Tribecca, New York hotel in a stellar tan colored ensemble

Margot stunned in a camel colored maxi shirt dress that featured long sleeves and reached to her mid-thighs.

The actress teamed the look with a pair of tan colored boots that had a small block heel and elongated her 5ft6 stature.

She accessorized with a statement tote size bag that perfectly matched her stellar footwear.

Gorgeous: Margot stunned in a camel colored maxi shirt dress that featured long sleeves and reached to her mid-thighs

Matching: She accessorized with a statement tote size bag that perfectly matched her stellar footwear

Margot attempted to keep a low profile with a pair of shades and styled her blonde hair out naturally with strands over her face.

The Australian beauty appeared to be wearing only a minimal amount of makeup on her porcelain skin.

Margot has been making quite the fashionable appearance while in New York over the past few days.

Season changes: Margot Robbie embraces fall fashion with autumnal shades

Keeping it natural: The Australian beauty appeared to be wearing only a minimal amount of makeup on her porcelain skin

Monday night saw her stun in a bold yellow power suit on top of a white T-shirt.

Her look saw her opt for matching pumps with her glam consisting of blushed cheeks and a bold red lip.

Margot's appearance comes as early 2020 will see her reprise her role as Harley Quinn for the upcoming Suicide Squad spin-off Birds Of Prey (And The Fantabulous Emancipation Of One Harley Quinn).

Fashionista: Monday night saw her stun in a bold yellow power suit on top of a white T-shirt

Reprising her role: Earlier this month, she appeared in the new trailer for the upcoming movie which picks up after her character Harley has split up from the Joker (played in Suicide Squad by Jared Leto)

Earlier this month, she appeared in the new trailer for the upcoming movie which picks up after her character Harley has split up from the Joker (played in Suicide Squad by Jared Leto).

The new film will find the actress transitioning into the role of vigilante hero after Harley rounds up a group of female anti-heroes to protect a young girl who steals a diamond from the crime lord Black Mask, played by Ewan McGregor.

Margot is producing the upcoming superhero flick, and its director Cathy Yan will become the first Asian woman to direct a superhero film.
description: Margot Robbie was the epitome of fall on Monday when she was spotted leaving her Tribeca, New York hotel in a stellar tan colored ensemble.
